name: Rubelike
description:
Rubelike Description

Scavenge hazardous planets in the search for precious water. Avoid aliens by cunningly navigate planets, aided by the newly developed Rubik-Drive! A device that has given mankind the ability to alter the very structure of planets

Rubelike is a classic take on the Rougelike genre, but twisting up the traversal mechanics. Each level takes place on a Rubik's Cube which the player can twist, and in turn reposition all game elements.
How long can you keep up in this Twisted experience, where each move will have repercussions down the line?

The first level is a tutorial which also goes through all information below

Goal

Collect all water resources on each planet and return to the rocket
Colliding with an Alien or running out of oxygen result in losing
Your oxygen will decrease by one each turn, a small amount of oxygen will be extracted from each scavenged water source
You have two moves and two twist for each turn

Controls Movement

Move with W, A ,S and D, the movement direction is relative the direction the character is facing

Camera

Look around the planet by holding down the RMB and moving the mouse
Zoom with the scroll wheel

Twisting

Grab the red outline around the planet with the LMB and move the mouse to twist a section of the planet
Release the LMB to apply the change

End Turn

Click the MMB to forfeit any remaining moves or twists and end your turn
